body_html:
I am allowing for padding on all dimensions when using the torch.nn.functional.pad function as long as the length of the padding tuple / 2 is less than the length of the tensor dimension. But should I be excluding the first two dimensions?

Preserve backward compatibility. If F.pad excluded the first two dims, keep it as such. If F.pad includes first two dims, keep it as such.

The PR looks largely bug-free and good to go.

Preserve backward compatibility. If F.pad excluded the first two dims, keep it as such. If F.pad includes first two dims, keep it as such.
The PR looks largely bug-free and good to go.
body:
> I am allowing for padding on all dimensions when using the torch.nn.functional.pad function as long as the length of the padding tuple / 2 is less than the length of the tensor dimension. But should I be excluding the first two dimensions?

Preserve backward compatibility. If F.pad excluded the first two dims, keep it as such. If F.pad includes first two dims, keep it as such.

The PR looks largely bug-free and good to go.
